casebody.data:
ERIE RAILROAD COMPANY, Plaintiff in Error (defendant below), v. James A. MacKAY, Jr., Defendant in Error (plaintiff below). (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 21, 1924.) No. 83. Edward V. Conwell, of New York City, for plaintiff in error. Sydney A. Syme, of Mt. Vernon, N. Y., for defendant in error.

Before HOUGH and MANTON, Circuit Judges, and LEARNED HAND, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
